summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示資訊清單是以唯讀或讀寫模式運作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the manifest is operating in read-only or read-write mode.

value.span: 值，表示資訊清單是以唯讀或讀寫模式操作。

span.span: A value indicating whether the manifest is operating in read-only or read-write mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您只需要讀取資訊清單，這個旗標設定為`True`。If you only need to read a manifest, set this flag to `True`. 如果您要撰寫新的資訊清單時，這個旗標設定為`False`。If you need to write a new manifest, set this flag to `False`. 預設為 `False`。The default is `False`. 這個屬性的資訊清單產生器中，提供其他內容，而且會影響報告某些錯誤訊息的方式。This property provides additional context for the manifest generator, and affects how some error messages are reported.

summary.span: 尋找所有指定的組件和檔案參考。

span.span: Locates all specified assembly and file references.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveFiles() cil managed

summary.span: 在載入資訊清單的相同目錄或目前目錄中搜尋，尋找所有指定的組件和檔案參考。

span.span: Locates all specified assembly and file references by searching in the same directory as the loaded manifest, or in the current directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個位置參考的組件，因此需要雜湊計算和組件識別解析的檔案。The location of each referenced assembly and file is required for hash computation and assembly identity resolution. 在 物件中會報告任何產生的錯誤或警告。Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveFiles(string[] searchPaths) cil managed

param.name: searchPaths
param.span: 字串陣列，指定要搜尋的目錄。

span.span: An array of strings specifying the directories to search.

summary.span: 在指定的目錄中搜尋，尋找所有指定的組件和檔案參考。

span.span: Locates all specified assembly and file references by searching in the specified directories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個位置參考的組件，因此需要雜湊計算和組件識別解析的檔案。The location of each referenced assembly and file is required for hash computation and assembly identity resolution. 在 物件中會報告任何產生的錯誤或警告。Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the object.

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 傳回資訊清單名稱。

span.span: Returns the manifest name.

returns.span: 字串，表示資訊清單的名稱。

span.span: A string indicating the name of the manifest.

summary.span: 更新每個參考的組件和檔案的檔案資訊。

span.span: Updates file information for each referenced assembly and file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案資訊包含雜湊計算以及每個參考的檔案和組件的檔案大小。The file information includes a hash computation and a file size for each referenced file and assembly. 此外，就會為任何參考的組件具有未指定的組件身分識別取得組件識別。Also, the assembly identity is obtained for any referenced assemblies with an unspecified assembly identity. 在 物件中會報告任何產生的錯誤或警告。Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UpdateFileInfo() cil managed

summary.span: 更新每個參考的組件和檔案的檔案資訊。

span.span: Updates file information for each referenced assembly and file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案資訊包含雜湊計算以及每個參考的檔案和組件的檔案大小。The file information includes a hash computation and a file size for each referenced file and assembly. 此外，就會為任何參考的組件具有未指定的組件身分識別取得組件識別。Also, the assembly identity is obtained for any referenced assemblies with an unspecified assembly identity. 在 物件中會報告任何產生的錯誤或警告。Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UpdateFileInfo(string targetFrameworkVersion) cil managed

param.name: targetFrameworkVersion
param.span: 要使用的目標 Framework 版本。

span.span: The version of the target framework to use.

param.span: 如果沒有目標 Framework 版本則為 Null。

span.span: Null if no target framework version.

param.span: 如果沒有目標 Framework 版本，則會使用 sha256 演算法。

span.span: If no target framework version, uses sha256 algorithm.

summary.span: 使用指定的目標 Framework 版本，更新每個參考組件和檔案的檔案資訊。

span.span: Updates file information for each referenced assembly and file, using the specified version of the target framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案資訊包含雜湊計算以及每個參考的檔案和組件的檔案大小。The file information includes a hash computation and a file size for each referenced file and assembly. 此外，就會為任何參考的組件具有未指定的組件身分識別取得組件識別。Also, the assembly identity is obtained for any referenced assemblies with an unspecified assembly identity. 在 物件中會報告任何產生的錯誤或警告。Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the object.
